cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 20th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 20th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Three bunks (i.e. 6 beds) in room. Excellent views to western flank of Port Campbell National Park.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Designed to give ladies a bit of privacy. Comfortable three bunks, suited to either individual guests or a small group of friends.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: New refurbished single room located on the first floor, with shared bathroom.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Large refurbished room with 1 king bed and 1 bunk bed. The room has access to a small balcony and garden. 
It is located on the ground floor. One of the family rooms has wheelchair access. We allow a small pet under 12kg upon manager approval.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
